en-GB.summary: Test your knowledge of UK traffic signs.
en-GB.name: Traffic Signs Quiz
en-GB.description:
How well do you know your UK traffic signs? This skill will test you on a selection of official road traffic signals. You will need a device with a screen to play, or view the image cards on your Alexa companion app. 

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Traffic Signs Quiz". At anytime, you can quit the game by saying "Alexa, exit"
